# workbench Package: 
The goal of `workbench` is to provide wraps a subset of the commands from the the Human 'Connectome' Workbench software <https://www.humanconnectome.org/software/connectome-workbench>.

## Installation

You can install `workbench` from GitHub with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("muschellij2/workbench")
```
